name: Word Search Puzzle Free App - First Challenged Crosswords Puzzles Games
name_original: Word Search Puzzle Free App - First Challenged Crosswords Puzzles Games
description:
A word search, word find, word seek, word sleuth or mystery word puzzle is a word game that consists of the letters of words placed in a grid, which usually has a rectangular or square shape.

The objective of this puzzle is to find and mark all the words hidden inside the box. The words may be placed horizontally, vertically, or diagonally. Often a list of the hidden words is provided, but more challenging puzzles may let the player figure them out.

The puzzles have, like crosswords and arrowords, been very popular in the World.Find the hidden words. You have to find secret words on board. There is mixed letters on the board. There is all possible words on the list. Stop using pen and papers you can find unlimited word search puzzles with different levels and sizes.
